attr.name: port
attr.helptext: Server port (for Unix derivatives, use a value greater than 1024)

attr.name: ssl
attr.helptext: Use secure sockets layer for connection to the server

attr.name: maxThreads
attr.helptext: The maximum number of concurrent threads allowed on the server

attr.name: httpPort
attr.helptext: The HTTP port on which to listen.

attr.name: httpsHost
attr.helptext: The IP address or domain name to which to redirect requests.

attr.name: httpsPort
attr.helptext: The HTTPS port to which to redirect requests.

attr.name: root
attr.helptext: The root directory for this pipeline. This directory serves as the base for any stages with relative paths for their root directories. If this attribute is blank, the application directory (CTP) serves as the base.

attr.name: admin
attr.helptext: The username of a user who is allowed to access the configuration pages for this pipeline. If blank, only a user with the admin role will have access.

attr.name: zip
attr.helptext: Unzip received data objects

attr.name: ip
attr.helptext: IP address from which to allow connections

attr.name: ip
attr.helptext: IP address from which to reject connections

attr.name: url
attr.helptext: The URL of the PolledHttpExportService to be polled for data objects

attr.name: zip
attr.helptext: Unzip received data objects

attr.name: interval
attr.helptext: Sleep time in milliseconds between polls of the import directory

attr.name: filePathTag
attr.helptext: DICOM tag in which to store the relative path to the file in the import directory (ggggeeee or DICOM PS 3.6 keyword)

attr.name: ip
attr.helptext: The IP address on which to open the SCP (use only when the server has multiple NICs).

attr.name: ip
attr.helptext: IP address from which to allow connections

attr.name: calledAET
attr.helptext: Called AE Title for which to allow connections

attr.name: callingAET
attr.helptext: Calling AE Title from which to allow connections

attr.name: sopClass
attr.helptext: SOP Class UID (or dcm4che name) to accept

attr.name: ip
attr.helptext: IP address from which to reject connections

attr.name: calledAET
attr.helptext: Called AE Title for which to reject connections

attr.name: callingAET
attr.helptext: Calling AE Title from which to reject connections

attr.name: ip
attr.helptext: IP address from which to allow connections

attr.name: ip
attr.helptext: IP address from which to reject connections

attr.name: projectId
attr.helptext: Google Cloud project_id to import data from.

attr.name: locationId
attr.helptext: Google Cloud location to import data from.

attr.name: dataSetName
attr.helptext: Google Cloud dataset to import data from.

attr.name: dicomStoreName
attr.helptext: DICOM Store name to import data from. If not specified then data from all DICOM Stores of the project will be imported

attr.name: googleCredentials
attr.helptext: Google Application Credentials key-file location. If empty, GOOGLE_APPLICATION_CREDENTIALS environment should point to valid credentials file.

attr.name: interval
attr.helptext: Sleep time in milliseconds between polls of the import directory

attr.name: filePathTag
attr.helptext: DICOM tag in which to store the relative path to the file in the import directory (ggggeeee or DICOM PS 3.6 keyword)

attr.name: projectId
attr.helptext: Google Cloud project_id to export data to.

attr.name: locationId
attr.helptext: Google Cloud location to export data to.

attr.name: dataSetName
attr.helptext: Google Cloud dataset to export data to.

attr.name: dicomStoreName
attr.helptext: DICOM Store name to export data to.

attr.name: includeContentDispositionHeader
attr.helptext: Include a Content-Disposition header in file export connections (not required by DICOM STOW-RS, but may be useful in some situations).

attr.name: cacheID
attr.helptext: The ID of an ObjectCache stage from which to obtain a DicomObject for comparison with the current DicomObject.

attr.name: level
attr.helptext: The level at which log entries are to be made. For example, at the patient level, an entry is made only when a new patient is encountered. At the instance level, an entry is made for every object.

attr.name: interval
attr.helptext: Interval (in objects received) between actions taken by this stage

attr.name: verbose
attr.helptext: Increase the amount of information logged

attr.name: log
attr.helptext: Make entries in the log. Entries are always available on the status page.

attr.name: interval
attr.helptext: Interval (in objects received) between actions taken by this stage

attr.name: interval
attr.helptext: Interval (in objects received) between actions taken by this stage

attr.name: collectGarbage
attr.helptext: Run system garbage collection

attr.name: logMemoryInUse
attr.helptext: Make a log entry containing the current heap size

attr.name: url
attr.helptext: The URL of the external database's DatabaseExportService

attr.name: username
attr.helptext: The username for authentication, if required by the external system

attr.name: password
attr.helptext: The password for authentication, if required by the external system

attr.name: interval
attr.helptext: Time in milliseconds between polls of the external system for verification

attr.name: maxAge
attr.helptext: The minimum time in days that an unverified object remains in the unverified queue (0 = forever)

attr.name: script
attr.helptext: The script file determining whether objects are to be decompressed

attr.name: script
attr.helptext: The script file determining whether objects are to be transcoded

attr.name: tsuid
attr.helptext: The transfer syntax UID to which to convert selected DicomObjects

attr.name: script
attr.helptext: The script file containing the anonymization instructions

attr.name: dicomScript
attr.helptext: The filter script file determining whether DicomObjects are to be processed

attr.name: fixPrivateElements
attr.helptext: Fix the VRs of private elements that appear in the Private Tag Dictionary.

attr.name: quarantineUncorrectedMismatches
attr.helptext: Quarantine objects that cannot be completely corrected.

attr.name: logUncorrectedMismatches
attr.helptext: Log all elements that cannot be corrected.

attr.name: script
attr.helptext: The script file containing document signatures and blanking regions

attr.name: log
attr.helptext: Log the matching signature

attr.name: setBurnedInAnnotation
attr.helptext: Set the BurnedInAnnotation element to "NO" for objects that match a signature.

attr.name: test
attr.helptext: Test mode causes regions to be highlighted rather than set to black

attr.name: script
attr.helptext: The script file determining whether objects are to be converted

attr.name: script
attr.helptext: The script file containing the anonymization instructions

attr.name: script
attr.helptext: The script file containing the anonymization instructions

attr.name: dicomScript
attr.helptext: The script file determining whether to send an email for a study

attr.name: username
attr.helptext: The username of the account on the SMTP server. If blank, no authentication is done.

attr.name: password
attr.helptext: The password of the account on the SMTP server (ignored if no authentication is done).

attr.name: tls
attr.helptext: If yes, use TLS for connection to the email server.

attr.name: timeout
attr.helptext: The maximum time in minutes between images in a study before sending the email.

attr.name: type
attr.helptext: Structure of the storage tree

attr.name: timeDepth
attr.helptext: Length of time in days before studies are automatically purged (0 = forever)

attr.name: fsNameTag
attr.helptext: DICOM tag to use to obtain the File System name for storage

attr.name: autoCreateUser
attr.helptext: Automatically create user account for the fsName

attr.name: port
attr.helptext: Port to use for a server to provide web access to stored objects

attr.name: ssl
attr.helptext: Require secure sockets layer for connection to the server

attr.name: frame
attr.helptext: Choose which frame(s) to use to create JPEG(s)

attr.name: wmax
attr.helptext: Maximum width of created JPEG image

attr.name: wmin
attr.helptext: Minimum width of created JPEG image

attr.name: q
attr.helptext: JPEG quality (0-100; -1: system default)

attr.name: root
attr.helptext: The location of the stored files.

attr.name: index
attr.helptext: The location of the index to the stored files.

attr.name: nLevels
attr.helptext: Depth of the storage tree

attr.name: maxSize
attr.helptext: Maximum size of each folder in the hierarchy

attr.name: logDuplicates
attr.helptext: Make a log entry whenever a duplicate SOPInstanceUID is stored

attr.name: rejectDuplicates
attr.helptext: Quarantine files with SOPInstanceUIDs that have already been stored

attr.name: acceptClones
attr.helptext: Accept files that are bit-for-bit identical to previously stored files, even if rejectDuplicates is set to "yes".

attr.name: frame
attr.helptext: Choose which frame(s) to use to create JPEG(s)

attr.name: wmax
attr.helptext: Maximum width of created JPEG image

attr.name: wmin
attr.helptext: Minimum width of created JPEG image

attr.name: q
attr.helptext: JPEG quality (0-100; -1: system default)

attr.name: defaultString
attr.helptext: Value to use in a directory or file name when an element specified in the structure attibute is missing in an object

attr.name: whitespaceReplacement
attr.helptext: Value to substitute for whitespace in directory and file names

attr.name: filenameTag
attr.helptext: DICOM element containing the filename, if the SOPInstanceUID is not to be used

attr.name: filenameSuffix
attr.helptext: A text string to be appended to the filename (only if filenameTag is present)

attr.name: acceptDuplicates
attr.helptext: yes: store duplicate files; no: overwrite duplicate files

attr.name: logDuplicates
attr.helptext: If yes, list duplicate files as they are stored

attr.name: defaultString
attr.helptext: Value to use in a directory or file name when an element specified in the structure attibute is missing in an object

attr.name: whitespaceReplacement
attr.helptext: Value to substitute for whitespace in directory and file names

attr.name: logDuplicates
attr.helptext: If yes, list duplicate files as they are stored

attr.name: url
attr.helptext: URL of the destination DICOM Storage SCP (dicom://calledAET:callingAET@ip:port)

attr.name: associationTimeout
attr.helptext: The maximum time (in seconds) after the last transmission to wait before closing the association. (0 = leave the association open unless forceClose is set to "yes")

attr.name: forceClose
attr.helptext: Close the DICOM association after each object transmission

attr.name: hostTag
attr.helptext: DICOM tag from which to obtain the destination SCP host (ggggeeee, optional)

attr.name: portTag
attr.helptext: DICOM tag from which to obtain the destination SCP port (ggggeeee, optional)

attr.name: callingAETTag
attr.helptext: DICOM tag from which to obtain the Calling AE Title (ggggeeee, optional)

attr.name: calledAETTag
attr.helptext: DICOM tag from which to obtain the Called AE Title (ggggeeee, optional)

attr.name: logDuplicates
attr.helptext: Make a log entry when an object is transmitted with a SOPInstanceUID that has occurred in the last 10 objects

attr.name: url
attr.helptext: URL of the destination DICOM STOW-RS SCP (starting with http:// or https://)

attr.name: includeContentDispositionHeader
attr.helptext: Include a Content-Disposition header in file export connections (not required by DICOM STOW-RS, but may be useful in some situations).

attr.name: logDuplicates
attr.helptext: Make a log entry when an object is transmitted with a SOPInstanceUID that has occurred in the last 10 objects.

attr.name: url
attr.helptext: URL of the destination HttpImportService (starting with http:// or https://)

attr.name: zip
attr.helptext: Zip data objects before transmission

attr.name: logDuplicates
attr.helptext: Make a log entry when an object is transmitted with a SOPInstanceUID that has occurred in the last 10 objects.

attr.name: cacheSize
attr.helptext: The number of files to group into a zip file before transmission. Note: This should normally be used when zip is set to "no" in the receiving HttpImportService.

attr.name: structure
attr.helptext: Sequence of text and DICOM tags specifying the directory hierarchy and the filename in the zip file. Path segments are separated by / characters. The last segment defines the name of the file. Do not include an extension in the name.

attr.name: defaultString
attr.helptext: Value to use in a file name when an element specified in the structure attibute is missing in an object

attr.name: whitespaceReplacement
attr.helptext: Value to substitute for whitespace in file names

attr.name: url
attr.helptext: The URL of the XNAT session servlet (https://host:port/data/JSESSION).

attr.name: cookieName
attr.helptext: The name of the XNAT server session cookie (JSESSIONID).

attr.name: username
attr.helptext: The username for authentication on the XNAT server.

attr.name: password
attr.helptext: The password for authentication on the XNAT server.

attr.name: port
attr.helptext: Port on which the PolledHttpImportService listens for connections

attr.name: ip
attr.helptext: IP address from which to allow connections

attr.name: ip
attr.helptext: IP address from which to reject connections

attr.name: url
attr.helptext: URL of the destination FTP site (ftp://ip:port/path)

attr.name: url
attr.helptext: URL of the destination SFTP site (sftp://ip:port/path)

attr.name: url
attr.helptext: URL of the destination SFTP site (ftps://ip:port/path)

attr.name: logResponses
attr.helptext: Log the contents of the responses from the AIM data service

attr.name: port
attr.helptext: The port on which the DatabaseExportService listens for request for verification of objects

attr.name: ssl
attr.helptext: Whether the verification service is to use SSL for communication

attr.name: adapterClass
attr.helptext: The fully qualified name of the DatabaseAdapter class that provides the interface to the external database

attr.name: cacheID
attr.helptext: The ID of an ObjectCache stage from which to obtain a DicomObject for comparison with the current DicomObject.

attr.name: tags
attr.helptext: List of DICOM tags to log, separated by semicolons (tag1; tag2; etc.)

DefaultHelpText.acceptDuplicateUIDs: Yes: keep all objects; no: overwrite objects with the same SOPInstanceUID
DefaultHelpText.adapterClass: The fully qualified name of the DatabaseAdapter class that provides the interface to the external database
DefaultHelpText.auditLogID: The ID of an AuditLog plugin in which to record transmissions
DefaultHelpText.auditLogTags: List of DICOM tags to log, separated by semicolons (tag1; tag2; etc.)
DefaultHelpText.cacheID: The id attribute of an ObjectCache stage from which to obtain PHI for the hierarchy
DefaultHelpText.calledAETTag: DICOM tag in which to store the Called AE Title (ggggeeee, optional)
DefaultHelpText.callingAETTag: DICOM tag in which to store the Calling AE Title (ggggeeee, optional)
DefaultHelpText.cc: The email addresses of the copied recipients, separated by commas.
DefaultHelpText.connectionIPTag: DICOM tag in which to store the IP Address of the sender (ggggeeee, optional)
DefaultHelpText.derefAliases: Whether to dereference LDAP aliases (default = never).
DefaultHelpText.dicomScript: The script file determining whether DicomObjects are to be accepted for processing
DefaultHelpText.expandTARs: Whether to unpack TAR files found in the archive
DefaultHelpText.exportDirectory: Storage directory to which selected studies can be copied for export
DefaultHelpText.fileNameTag: DICOM tag in which to store the name of the file in the archive directory (ggggeeee or DICOM PS 3.6 keyword)
DefaultHelpText.filePathTag: DICOM tag in which to store the path to the file in the archive directory (ggggeeee or DICOM PS 3.6 keyword)
DefaultHelpText.fileStorageServiceID: The ID of the StorageService that manages objects referenced by the data stored in the database
DefaultHelpText.filenameTag: DICOM tag in which to store the name of the file (ggggeeee or DICOM PS 3.6 keyword)
DefaultHelpText.from: The email address of the sender.
DefaultHelpText.fsName: File System name to insert in DicomObjects (optional)
DefaultHelpText.fsNameTag: DICOM tag in which to store the File System name (ggggeeee or DICOM PS 3.6 keyword)
DefaultHelpText.id: This field is required only when the stage is to be referenced by another stage. If present, it must be unique.
DefaultHelpText.includeModality: Include the modality in sent emails
DefaultHelpText.includePatientID: Include the Patient ID in sent emails
DefaultHelpText.includePatientName: Include the Patient Name in sent emails
DefaultHelpText.includeStudyDate: Include the Study Date in sent emails
DefaultHelpText.interval: Sleep time in milliseconds between polls of the export queue
DefaultHelpText.logConnections: Log IP addresses of received connections
DefaultHelpText.lookupTable: The lookup table file for special de-identification (optional)
DefaultHelpText.maxUnchunked: The maximum file size (in MB) to be transmitted without setting Transfer-Encoding to chunked (default = 20)
DefaultHelpText.minAge: The minimum age of objects in milliseconds before import
DefaultHelpText.name: Name for display on web pages (not required to be unique)
DefaultHelpText.openAMURL: The URL of the OpenAM server, including the protocol and the port (http://openam.university.edu:80)
DefaultHelpText.password: The password for authentication, if required by the destination system
DefaultHelpText.poolSize: The number of active DatabaseAdapters to run concurrently
DefaultHelpText.port: Port on which the stage listens for connections
DefaultHelpText.proxyIPAddress: The IP address of the proxy server (or blank if no proxy server)
DefaultHelpText.proxyPassword: The password for proxy authentication (or blank if proxy authentication is not used)
DefaultHelpText.proxyPort: The port of the proxy server (or blank if no proxy server)
DefaultHelpText.proxyUsername: The username for proxy authentication (or blank if proxy authentication is not used)
DefaultHelpText.quality: The quality parameter to use for lossy compression (1-100), ignored for lossless compression
DefaultHelpText.quarantineTimeDepth: Length of time in days before objects are automatically purged from the quarantine (0 = forever)
DefaultHelpText.referral: How to respond to LDAP referrals (default = ignore).
DefaultHelpText.regex: A regular expression for matching an IP address. This is an alternative to the ip field for matching ranges.
DefaultHelpText.returnStoredFile: Yes: return the stored object; no: return the original object
DefaultHelpText.root: Storage directory for use by the stage for data (must be unique)
DefaultHelpText.script: The filter script file determining whether objects are to be quarantined
DefaultHelpText.securityPrincipal: The LDAP principal (e.g., cn=${username}, ou=people, dc=med, dc=university, dc=edu)
DefaultHelpText.sendDigestHeader: Include a Digest header in the connection to allow the destination to detect errors at the application level
DefaultHelpText.setStandardExtensions: Assign file extensions based on file type (.dcm, .xml, .zip, .md)
DefaultHelpText.setWorldReadable: Set the read permission on stored files
DefaultHelpText.setWorldWritable: Set the write permission on stored files
DefaultHelpText.skipJPEGBaseline: Skip objects with the JPEGBaseline TransferSyntaxUID.
DefaultHelpText.smtpServer: The SMTP server to be used to send emails (e.g., mail.isp.net or smtp.gmail.com).
DefaultHelpText.smtpPort: The port of the SMTP server (e.g., 25 or 465).
DefaultHelpText.structure: Sequence of DICOM tags specifying the elements that define the hierarchy
DefaultHelpText.subject: The subject for the sent emails. This can be used to indicate the trial name.
DefaultHelpText.suppressDuplicates: Ignore objects with the same SOPInstanceUID as one of the last 10 objects received
DefaultHelpText.throttle: Miinimum time in milliseconds between object transmissions
DefaultHelpText.timeTag: DICOM tag in which to store the time of the received connection (ggggeeee, optional)
DefaultHelpText.to: The email addresses of the recipients, separated by commas.
DefaultHelpText.treeRoot: The root directory of the archive
DefaultHelpText.username: The username for authentication, if required by the destination system (or blank if authentication is not used)
DefaultHelpText.usersClassName: The Java class for user authentication. Do not change this unless you know what you're doing.
DefaultHelpText.xmlScript: The script file determining whether XmlObjects are to be accepted for processing
DefaultHelpText.zipScript: The script file determining whether ZipObjects are to be accepted for processing

Pipeline.name: Export ClearCanvas AIM XML to AIM Data Service
